summary: A married couple learns that it is possible to build an illegal house in the outskirts of Rome, as long as it is erected in one single night and has a roof.
cast: Gabriella Pallotta|Giorgio Listuzzi|Gastone Renzelli|Angelo Bigioni|Maria Di Rollo|Luciano Pigozzi|Maria Di Fiori|Carolina Ferri|Aldo Boi|Fernando Gerra|Luisa Alessandri|Emilia Maritini|Giuseppe Martini|Maria Sittoro|Angelo Visentin
title: El techo
